Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides a drop-in day service for street drinkers. Offers a clothing store, laundry, free food, hot drinks, free telephone, referrals to outreach and accommodation. Sign posting to other agencies and offers support. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon, Tues, Thurs & Fri 9.30am-4.30pm (office times); Mon, Tues, Thurs & Fri 10.30am-2.30pm (drop-in times)
